{"id":533966168,"lang":"cpp","time":"7 months, 1 week","timestamp":1628208736,"status_display":"Accepted","runtime":"8 ms","url":"/submissions/detail/533966168/","is_pending":"Not Pending","title":"Multiply Strings","memory":"6.7 MB","code":"class Solution {\npublic:\n    string multiply(string num1, string num2) {\n        int n1=num1.size(),n2=num2.size(),shift1=0,shift2=0,c=0;\n        vector<int>s(n1+n2+1);\n        for(int i=n1-1;i>=0;i--){\n            shift2=0;\n            c=0;\n            int m1=num1[i]-'0';\n            for(int j=n2-1;j>=0;j--){\n                int m2=num2[j]-'0';\n                int r=m1*m2+s[shift1+shift2]+c;\n                c=r/10;\n                s[shift1+shift2]=r%10;\n                shift2++;                \n            }\n            if(c>0)s[shift1+shift2]+=c;\n            shift1++;\n        }\n        int i=n1+n2;\n        while(i>=0 && s[i]==0)i--;\n        if(i==-1) return \"0\";\n        string ans=\"\";\n        while(i>=0){\n            ans+=to_string(s[i]);\n            i--;\n        } \n        return ans;\n            \n    }\n};","compare_result":"","title_slug":"multiply-strings"}
